description: Situated on the top floor of the Raphaël hotel just behind Piazza Navona, this restaurant serves some of the best vegetarian cuisine in Rome. Each of the elaborate dishes boasts numerous ingredients and every single course is a delightful surprise. Equally stunning is the panoramic terrace overlooking the city’s rooftops, where meals are served in fine weather.
